title: Pykes ult should rotate
body:
I feel like Pykes Ult would be more intuitive and overall feel a lot more satisfying if the 'X' pivoted around the position he was at before cast in the direction of the position the cursor is at.

Similar to Karthus E, Aniva W, Aatrox Qs ect.
To imagine what I'm saying the bottom of the 2 lines should always be closest to Pyke.

With how it is now the range of the spell changes depending on direction and this solution would also fix this.
